1: You are rather cerebral, including in the expression of your sensuality. Despite your extroverted side and your momentary joy, you keep your emotions at bay.
2: You tend at the moment to allow yourself pleasures that could harm your body: readapt your diet to eliminate the last deviations and return to the consumption of unprocessed products in everyday life. If you feel a big hit of fatigue today, do not hesitate to cancel plans to rest. You may have negative feelings about yourself: don't get carried away.
3: Do not transpose onto others the blockages you have to face. You tend to challenge yourself with authority, and while this might prove fruitful in times of injustice, don't lock yourself into a posture of obtuse disobedience.
4: A friendly and impromptu meeting could take place, be ready to welcome it. You are sensitive. You show empathy and those around you naturally turn to you in case of concern.
